import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useParams}from'react-router-dom';import'./ProjectsTopic.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function ProjectsTopic(){const{id}=useParams();const[project,setProject]=useState(null);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState(null);useEffect(()=>{// 데이터 로드
import('../../data/projects/1_cafe_chromatography.json').then(module=>{const data=module.default;if(Array.isArray(data)){const foundProject=data.find(p=>p.id===id);if(foundProject){setProject(foundProject);}else{setError('Project not found');}}else{setError('Fetched data is not an array');}}).catch(error=>{setError('Error loading JSON data');console.error(error);}).finally(()=>{setLoading(false);});},[id]);if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:"Loading..."});}if(error){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:error});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"projects-topic",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:project.image,alt:project.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:project.description})]});}export default ProjectsTopic;
